scheme_name: One Time Financial Support for Economically Weaker Meritorious ST Students
details: The Tribal Welfare Department, Government of Tripura was launched by the "One Time Financial Support for Economically Weaker Meritorious ST Students" scheme aimed at providing financial assistance to economically weaker meritorious Scheduled Tribe (ST) students. This support enables them to pursue professional and other courses in government-recognized institutes and colleges with the necessary financial support to continue their education without financial constraints.
benefits: A one-time financial support of ₹1,00,000/- will be provided to selected students in two installments: ₹50,000/- released immediately after selection and ₹50,000/- upon production of pass certificates for the 1st year course.
eligibility: The student should be a domicile of Tripura.
The student should belong to the Scheduled Tribe (ST) community.
The student should have passed Class 10th (Madhyamik) for pre-12th courses or Class 12th (H.S level) for post-12th courses in 2022 with at least 45% marks.
The student must have taken admission in any professional course listed in Annexure-A and Annexure-B during the academic year 2022-23, with a course duration of at least 2 years.
application_process: Online registration using the icon “New Registration” at the NSP Portal URL - https://scholarships.gov.in/, by providing accurate and correct information as per their documents.
After successfully getting the registration done, students will get their “Student Registration ID”.
Through “Student Registration ID” students will be able to login into the account using the icon “Fresh Application” at NSP Portal.
Go to https://bms.tripura.gov.in and select "**Citizen Login**."
If you haven’t registered yet, click on "**Register here**" and fill in your Name, Email ID, and Mobile number.
After receiving the OTP on your mobile number or email ID, enter it to complete the verification.
Once the profile page is open, fill in the ration card number to fetch your details.
You will receive a message confirming that your profile is complete.
Click on "**Apply Online**" and select the scheme titled "One-Time Financial Support for Economically Weaker Meritorious ST Students" **Enroll**
Select "**Proceed**" to open the application form.
Fill in your bank details and upload the required documents.
Enter your NSP Registration ID and Academic details, then click "**Next**."
Select "**Final Submit**" to complete your application.
An Application ID will be generated. Click on "**View and Print Acknowledgement Slip**" for your records.
documents_required: Income Certificate (issued by Sub Divisional Magistrate (SDM)/DCM).
